value:
$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|$w0|Ah... I believe I have arrived. I am
unsure of whether I'm ready, but...
a few deep breaths will help.$k$p$EFace|Phew...$k$pNow then... I have finally arrived
in the mortal realm of Midgard.$k$pMy heart is nearly beating out of
my chest... How can I expect to
accomplish this mission alone?$k$pNevertheless, I must not give in to
my doubts... I must do whatever I can
to help the mortals of this world.$k$p$Sbs2000|$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|What are you mumbling about
over there, you simpleton?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|My apologies... I hope I wasn't
disturbing you.$k$p$Sbs150|I am... Well, not that you have any
reason to know my name, but it
would seem rude not to introduc—$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_11,0|$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Shut your mouth, cow.$k$pI know who you are. You're Askr's
little servant. Lady Embla told me all
about you... You're my enemy.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Bat wings, and... Y-you serve Embla?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Yes. I'm Elm, faithful retainer to
Lady Embla.$k$pIf all he can muster is a dull little
cow like you, Askr's power must
be waning indeed.$k$pEither that or he must have always
been weak compared to Lady Embla.
Weak and deserving of death.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Y-you may say whatever wish about
me, but I cannot allow—or rather...$k$pI would appreciate it if you would
refrain from saying such things.$k$pOf course, I realize that I am your
foe and you may refuse to listen to
me, but nevertheless, I must ask—$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...You're incredibly irritating. All the
more reason for you to die!$k$p

$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh! ...M-my strength...has given
out too soon.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Hurry up and die, weakling. I have
more worthy sacrifices to make on
the altar of my lady...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Up ahead! Someone's under
attack by—$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Do not interfere, mortal scum!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|You...you saved me! I'm struggling
to find the words to adequately
express my thanks. First, let me sa—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|No need to thank us! But I would
like to know more about who
you are exactly...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh! Of course! Please allow me to
introduce myself—as is only proper
in circumstances such as these...$k$p$EFace|I am Ash, retainer to Lord Askr.
I have come here at the behest
of my lord.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Lord Askr? You mean...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah, yes, perhaps I should back up
and explain myself more fully...
Ummm... Hmmm...$k$p$EFace|Lord Askr, the Divine Dragon who
once granted his power to mortals.
I believe you're familiar? That Askr.$k$pI was created of Askr's domain
and I have served him since.$k$pIt is that very service that brings me
before you now—and I must say I am
pleased to make your acquaintance!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Forgive me. Was that too much?
Would you like me to repeat myself
more slowly? Will that help?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|No, no. This is all so sudden, my mind
is racing to catch up. You are retainer
to Askr...the Divine Dragon. Then...$k$pWhy are you here? What did Lord
Askr send you to do?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I must stop Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|But Embla is...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla is terrible in a way that defies
all reason, and she has decided that
any who carry Askr's blood must die.$k$p$EFace|Though I have only so much to offer,
it would be my honor to do what
I can to prevent such an occurrence.$k$p$Sbs150|
